vs-button/type.description: The type of button to use

vs-button/color.description: Change the color of the button

vs-button/textColor.description: Change the font color of the button

vs-button/iconPack.description: Determines if the icon is set after the text

vs-button/iconAfter.description: Determines if the icon is set after the text

vs-button/lineOrigin.description: Determines the output of the line on the button (line)

vs-button/linePosition.description: Determine if the button (line) has the line up or down

vs-button/gradientDirection.description: Determine the angle of the gradient on the button

vs-button/gradientColorSecondary.description: Change the secondary color on the button (gradient)

vs-button/to.description: Added router push navigation to button

vs-button/target.description: Presence or absence of target property
